# Hong Kong ICT Awards

}}
-->|location=|country=|presenter=|host=|former name=|preshow_host=|acts=|reward=Smart Business, Digital Entertainment, FinTech, ICT Startup, Smart Living, Smart People, Smart Mobility, and Student Innovation|year=|year2=|holder_label=|holder=|most_awards=|most_nominations=|award1_type=|award1_winner=|award2_type=|award2_winner=|award3_type=|award3_winner=|award4_type=|award4_winner=|award5_type=|award5_winner=|website=}}Hong Kong ICT Awards is a technology-related award in Hong Kong, organised annually by the Office of the Government Chief Information Officer of the Innovation and Technology Bureau of the Government of Hong Kong.
The eight categories of the award include Smart Business, Digital Entertainment, FinTech, ICT Startup, Smart Living, Smart People, Smart Mobility, and Student Innovation. The recipients attract widespread media coverage every year.
See also
* List of computer science awards
